project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: Build a Python program to fetch and display the current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Implement API call to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse the received weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Create a function to format and display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the API fetching, data parsing, and display functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
